text: Ninkal unkal cattiyankalai unkalukkitaiyil (cati, turokam) akiyavarrukkuk karanamaka akkik kollatirkal; (avvaru ceyvatal) nilai perra (unkalutaiya) patam caruki vitum; anriyum, ninkal allahvin pataiyai vittum (makkalait) tatuttukkontirunta karanattal, (im'maiyil perun) tunpattai anupavikka neritum; (marumaiyilum) unkalukkuk katumaiyana vetanaiyum untu
